meanings.sent1: She decided to redyeing her favorite shirt to make it look new.
meanings.sent2: After the color faded, she redyeing her hair to its original shade.
meanings.sent3: The redyeing process turned into a colorful adventure in her kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was like redyeing the world with vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush danced on the canvas, redyeing the scene with life.

meanings.definition: The act of dyeing something again.
meanings.sent1: The redyeing of the fabric brought back its original brightness.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of redyeing from her grandmother, who was a skilled seamstress.
meanings.sent3: The redyeing of the curtains made them look brand new and refreshed the room.
meanings.sent4: In the fashion industry, redyeing garments is a common practice to reduce waste.
meanings.sent5: The redyeing of the old carpet transformed the room into a cozy space.
